1: I honor wise counsel and choose a compatible life partner
2: I choose a spouse from my supportive family community.
3: Prosper, be fruitful, and multiply into a thriving community.
4: Blessing turns outsiders into heirs with a flourishing home.
5: Seek wise family counsel when starting new chapters.
6: Choose a spouse aligned with shared values for a blessed home.
7: Obeying parents brings guidance and fruitful direction.
8: Choose partners who bring joy to your family.
9: Marriages build bridges between families and promote peace.
10: Move toward a hopeful future with purpose.
11: Rest and renew with simple means wherever the journey pauses.
12: A bridge connects earth and heaven through guiding messengers.
13: Received land becomes a lasting inheritance for generations.
14: Expanding presence blesses all families across the earth.
15: Constant presence protects every journey and fulfills every promise.
16: Recognize the divine presence right where you are.
17: Recognize sacred places as gateways to heaven.
18: Honor meaningful moments with simple rituals of gratitude.
19: Name meaningful places to remember life-changing encounters.
20: Walk with guiding presence, protection, and daily provision.
21: I return home in peace and honor the divine.
22: I honor all gifts by giving a tenth with gratitude
